title: I just want opinions on this.
body:
Before I post the chat log that got my lvl 103 acc perm-banned after not receiving any punishments in almost a year and moving from lvl 0 to lvl 1 checkpoint 2 on the honor system I want to give you the lay out.
 
I was in my promo's, second game, picked jungle as thats my strongest role. Haven't said anything in game yet ... grabbing my blue lvl 1 and the mid lane ziggs steals my blue.. So instead of ragging I simply continued playing. He than again stole another camp and this point I figured there was no point so I went AFK. This is the 1 game chat log that got my ban. replies.body:
Watched the replay.

And your story is pretty much a complete fabrication except where you admitted to afk'ing.

Ziggs didn't touch a single one of your buffs the **entire** game. You got every buff that you attacked and the only time you lost buffs was when you died.

So my only question for you is what did you hope to gain by lying?

Sympathy? Looks like you didn't get that even with the lie.
rekt{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> Sympathy? Looks like you didn't get that even with the lie.

If possible would you mind posting the replay here so others don't have to go hunting for it?

I accessed it through in-client methods by searching for the OP's profile, so others will have to do the same if they want to watch the replay.

But the client is unnecessary. You can look at the OP's op.gg profile or League's own match history [here](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2950780994/221626699?tab=stats) to see that the ziggs didn't have a single neutral minion kill, thus couldn't have stolen any buff. The timing (last match before the ban), the references to characters (allied vayne, ziggs, and pyke. Enemy veigar, thresh, and likely reference to wukong), and the afk'ing part way through the match (you can see this in both the replay and the linear gold gain on the match statistics) all point to that game being the match described.

Intentionally feeding and griefing gameplay aspects of League can lead to an instant 14 day of permanent ban. 

Edit: completely glossed over the part where you said you AFKed.
I've actually only received 3, this being my 3rd. But thats beyond the point. My point is that this doesn't warrant a damn 10 game chat restriction let a lot the final warning?

If you recieved 3 punishments, your next one would be a permanent ban (assuming they never de-escalated) regardless of how severe the action was. The punishment tiers go: 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 14 day gameplay ban, and finally a permanent ban. 

 Certain things like using zero tolerance language, intentionally feeding, or using 3rd party programs can skip punishment tiers as they're considered more detrimental to the game when compared to toxicity.

mine went 75 game, 2 week, and now this. The 2 week should of never happened... I got that for leave buster but that was 100% my computers fault like league clients just wouldn't load for me sometimes no matter what I did until I upgrade my comp.

The 75 game chat restriction doesn't exist anymore and hasn't been around since like S4_ish_. So, I don't think that had anything to do with it. 

 The 2 week ban is definitely what caused it. It was stated on your reform card that your next punishment would be a permanent ban, no matter how severe the action was. 

 Also, in the future, file support tickets for issues like the one you had with the client. It's too late to do anything now but if there was evidence of the client crashing you might have gotten the 2 week ban overturned.

I got my 75 game back in s4, got the 2 week may 2018 last year, and i never made a ticket cuz honestly I didn't give a damn I thought it was a good thing for me to take a break from the game especially  with the weather warming up and shit. And the point im trying to get at is that THIS GAME LONG DOES NOT DESERVE A PUNISHMENT... There is no way...like no way.. bro I watch the biggest league twitch streamers legit call each other trash all the time and nothing happens to them. Stop this nonsense I didn't threaten, belittle, make racist remarks. I stated that you were trash no offense, like what?
Well you were obviously doing something wrong to get repeatedly reported. So obviously there is more to this story than you are letting on.

what do you mean "repeatedly" 

there is only 1 game log and I just showed you it.?
I challenge you to write to https://support.riotgames.com and ask them how any games were considered in your punishment. Guaranteed it was more than 1 game.

And regaining honor is not easy, don't give me that bullshit. I get 1-2 honors about every other game and it took me 2 months to get back to that. Also its been almost a year since my last offense, and that offense was because I kept DCing from games before they even started and could never connect. like this is all a very fragile and very unfortunate situation.

You told Pyke he was bad, you shouted at Ziggs in all caps a lot, you announced that you were going AFK, you accused Ziggs of trolling, you accused others of trolling, you stated that you AFK when someone insults you. You were on thin ice after previous punishments, and showing up in a report yet again led Riot to realize that your behavior would be an ongoing problem, so they permabanned you. They gave you fair warning; sorry.

We lost and my team was a bit angry and wanted to report me but changed their minds after they calmed down a bit. Except for the support Lux who died 4 times before I had died once in 7 minutes by running right up to them trying to get kills while I'm trying to farm since they had a stronger early game than I had as Jhin then proceeded to flame me for most of the game... but AFK'ing because you're mad at a teammate is bad on you. Just mute them. Simple as that. If the teammate continues to do things intentionally like taking your camps then report them for griefing afterwards.
I played until about the 20 min mark, he didn't stop the game was over. I just sat in base. Still don't think this was warranted a permban :/

The player who sits out and leaves the ENTIRE TEAM at a disadvantage. AFK'ing is not acceptable. Play the game out. Report the troll afterwards and YOU don't get in trouble regardless just because you played through the whole game.
